title.text: Under the Cherry Blossom Trees, Once Again / The Sleepy Season, Slip / A Wolf Pretends

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Ousai Academy starts a new school year. Suzu's dog, Boa, visits the school. Takatoshi's little sister joins as a first year. The student council gets concerned about improper relationships at school. Another squid scene with Takatoshi where he sprays milk on a model butt. Mutsumi sets up a match with Toki, where Toki would have to join the judo club if she loses.

title.text: I Was Watching Over Hagimura Suzu / Ousai & Eiyou Have Another Mixer! / Always Have Tissues Ready for Your Check-up

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Some gags about the art pieces in class. Suzu feels under the weather so the council has her rest in the infirmary for the school day. Shino shows Uomi the different locales on campus, but they interpret each place with something sexual. Uomi offers some concerns about the placement of the men's restroom. Aria has a spot on guessing an object based on its silhouette shape. Gags about allergies and mouse pads. Takatoshi makes a poster. The girls ask Takatoshi for tissues. Uomi asks Takatoshi if there's a girl he likes. And a follow-up to the squid episode where Hata is done with her part but Aria shows up.

title.text: The Three-Day Vice President / Beautiful Lady

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Takatoshi asks Kotomi to act as vice president while his class goes to Okinawa. Nene has some gags involving her device. Kotomi joins Aria and Shino in morning inspections. As the class tours Okinawa, Hata appears and asks Takatoshi to check on two teachers that seem to be flirting with each other. Suzu gets separated from the group; the students and teachers look for her. When Yokohama freaks out over a display stand for spotted dick, they find Suzu. Shino ponders whether to call Takatoshi. The next day, the class visits a lighthouse and has fun at the beach; Shino, Aria and Kotomi do the same. The class feeds fish underwater while wearing diving helmets. Kotomi asks Shino whether she and Takatoshi are dating, so Shino calls Takatoshi. When Suzu and Takatoshi return they share some snacks they bought.

title.text: Emphasis Point Point Point / Moe-tail / Always Peeled Back at Groundbreaking Levels

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Uomi appears at the school in Shino's gym clothes, as her own clothes got wet from the rain. She observes the council as they do their activities in the office. Hata interviews them. Shino and Takatoshi walk the halls. Kaede-chan has a segment where she walks the halls and observes each of the student council girls. In the squid segment, Takatoshi is approached by Aria, who then runs away. Nene has a trivia segment about the history of dildos. Takatoshi and the gang study at the library. Takatoshi and Kotomi have to take make-up exams, so they have a study session with the council girls at their house. Aria does a "what is this?" segment; the object is a vibrator. For Golden Week, the council members visit Aria's company amusement park and test the rides. They enjoy a dinner afterwards.

title.text: Support Style / Pitching a Tent After the Deed / Fighting Girls

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: The council members talk about food and the summer weather. An assortment of jokes from the manga. It starts to rain. Hata photographs the council members as they model the new school swimsuits. On the way home, they cut through a park. The judo girls have marathon practice by running into town, but Toki gets lost. A stray cat visits campus. The council holds a send-off assembly for the judo club.

title.text: Student Council President: The Idol / Attack Item Thrrob

detailEpisodeInfo.summery: Shino is recruited to become a Japanese idol. She pictures life as one, where she gets along with the staff and does quite well at the tasks given, including modeling and singing at concerts. But when she sees Takatoshi dating a girl that resembles her, she wakes up from her dream and declines the offer. The girls ponder self-defense strategies and take lessons from the judo club. Igarashi is especially worried as it means having to interact with Takatoshi. Aria has another guessing game involving what is going on a steamy car in traffic. In the Takatoshi and Squid segments, Suzu helps Takatoshi clean up. Aria and the other girls are concerned about what they have observed.

title.text: I Said Something Good / The Ones Who Make You, You / Yep, It Came Out
Play with Water and Get Soaked / All-purpose Wing / Summer Night, Summer Morning
Hata Ranko Does It! / Female Alumni are Super Awesome / Got the Wrong Idea
The Tsuda Mushroom was as Expected / Feathers Fly / What it Feels Like to be a Pumpkin
A Pure Reaction to a Double Entendre / That Happens in Some Countries / Play With the Snow, Santa's Heirs!
It's Happy New Year / What It Takes to Stand Above Someone / Virgin / I Can't Believe You're Washing That
How to Talk About Love Properly / Long Range Attack / Hair Showing / Cherry Blossom Sky

overviews.content:
Formerly an all-girl school, Ousai Academy has recently gone co-ed. Enter student council vice president Takatoshi Tsuda, one of Ousai's first male students. He's adapting rather well now that he's in his second year, but there's still a lot to get used to. For example, what do girls talk about when there aren't any guys around? In Seitokai Yakuindomo*, pretty much exactly what you'd expect: sex!
Although charged with upholding morality among the student body, the Ousai Student Council is notoriously perverted, especially president Shino Amakusa. As they carry out their duties to the school, Tsuda, Shino, and their fellow council members must balance curiosity with decency and sex jokes with studying. It takes a perv to know one, after all!
